speaker: SOMERSET
text:
It
               
              is
               
              too
               
              late
              ;
               
              I
               
              cannot
               
              send
               
              them
               
              now
              .

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
This
               
              expedition
               
              was
               
              by
               
              York
               
              and
               
              Talbot

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
Too
               
              rashly
               
              plotted
              .
               
              All
               
              our
               
              general
               
              force

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
Might
               
              with
               
              a
               
              sally
               
              of
               
              the
               
              very
               
              town

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
Be
               
              buckled
               
              with
              .
               
              The
               
              overdaring
               
              Talbot

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
Hath
               
              sullied
               
              all
               
              his
               
              gloss
               
              of
               
              former
               
              honor

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
By
               
              this
               
              unheedful
              ,
               
              desperate
              ,
               
              wild
               
              adventure
              .

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
York
               
              set
               
              him
               
              on
               
              to
               
              fight
               
              and
               
              die
               
              in
               
              shame

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
That
              ,
               
              Talbot
               
              dead
              ,
               
              great
               
              York
               
              might
               
              bear
               
              the
               
              name
              .

speaker: CAPTAIN
text:
Here
               
              is
               
              Sir
               
              William
               
              Lucy
              ,
               
              who
               
              with
               
              me

speaker: CAPTAIN
text:
Set
               
              from
               
              our
               
              o’er-matched
               
              forces
               
              forth
               
              for
               
              aid
              .

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              Sir
               
              William
              ,
               
              whither
               
              were
               
              you
               
              sent
              ?

speaker: LUCY
text:
Whither
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ?
               
              From
               
              bought
               
              and
               
              sold
               
              Lord
               
              Talbot
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
Who
              ,
               
              ringed
               
              about
               
              with
               
              bold
               
              adversity
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
Cries
               
              out
               
              for
               
              noble
               
              York
               
              and
               
              Somerset

speaker: LUCY
text:
To
               
              beat
               
              assailing
               
              Death
               
              from
               
              his
               
              weak
               
              regions
              ;

speaker: LUCY
text:
And
               
              whiles
               
              the
               
              honorable
               
              captain
               
              there

speaker: LUCY
text:
Drops
               
              bloody
               
              sweat
               
              from
               
              his
               
              war-wearied
               
              limbs

speaker: LUCY
text:
And
              ,
               
              in
               
              advantage
               
              ling’ring
              ,
               
              looks
               
              for
               
              rescue
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
You
              ,
               
              his
               
              false
               
              hopes
              ,
               
              the
               
              trust
               
              of
               
              England’s
               
              honor
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
Keep
               
              off
               
              aloof
               
              with
               
              worthless
               
              emulation
              .

speaker: LUCY
text:
Let
               
              not
               
              your
               
              private
               
              discord
               
              keep
               
              away

speaker: LUCY
text:
The
               
              levied
               
              succors
               
              that
               
              should
               
              lend
               
              him
               
              aid
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
While
               
              he
              ,
               
              renownèd
               
              noble
               
              gentleman
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
Yield
               
              up
               
              his
               
              life
               
              unto
               
              a
               
              world
               
              of
               
              odds
              .

speaker: LUCY
text:
Orleance
               
              the
               
              Bastard
              ,
               
              Charles
              ,
               
              Burgundy
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
Alanson
              ,
               
              Reignier
               
              compass
               
              him
               
              about
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
And
               
              Talbot
               
              perisheth
               
              by
               
              your
               
              default
              .

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
York
               
              set
               
              him
               
              on
              ;
               
              York
               
              should
               
              have
               
              sent
               
              him
               
              aid
              .

speaker: LUCY
text:
And
               
              York
               
              as
               
              fast
               
              upon
               
              your
               
              Grace
               
              exclaims
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
Swearing
               
              that
               
              you
               
              withhold
               
              his
               
              levied
               
              host

speaker: LUCY
text:
Collected
               
              for
               
              this
               
              expedition
              .

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
York
               
              lies
              .
               
              He
               
              might
               
              have
               
              sent
               
              and
               
              had
               
              the
               
              horse
              .

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
I
               
              owe
               
              him
               
              little
               
              duty
               
              and
               
              less
               
              love
              ,

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
And
               
              take
               
              foul
               
              scorn
               
              to
               
              fawn
               
              on
               
              him
               
              by
               
              sending
              .

speaker: LUCY
text:
The
               
              fraud
               
              of
               
              England
              ,
               
              not
               
              the
               
              force
               
              of
               
              France
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
Hath
               
              now
               
              entrapped
               
              the
               
              noble-minded
               
              Talbot
              .

speaker: LUCY
text:
Never
               
              to
               
              England
               
              shall
               
              he
               
              bear
               
              his
               
              life
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
But
               
              dies
               
              betrayed
               
              to
               
              fortune
               
              by
               
              your
               
              strife
              .

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
Come
              ,
               
              go
              .
               
              I
               
              will
               
              dispatch
               
              the
               
              horsemen
               
              straight
              .

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
Within
               
              six
               
              hours

              will
               
              be
               
              at
               
              his
               
              aid
              .

speaker: LUCY
text:
Too
               
              late
               
              comes
               
              rescue
              ;
               
              he
               
              is
               
              ta’en
               
              or
               
              slain
              ,

speaker: LUCY
text:
For
               
              fly

              could
               
              not
               
              if
               
              he
               
              would
               
              have
               
              fled
              ;

speaker: LUCY
text:
And
               
              fly
               
              would
               
              Talbot
               
              never
              ,
               
              though
               
              he
               
              might
              .

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
If
               
              he
               
              be

              ,
               
              brave

              ,

              adieu
              .

speaker: LUCY
text:
His
               
              fame
               
              lives
               
              in
               
              the

              ,
               
              his

              in
